Maroon 5's single, "One More Night," which was co-written and produced by Max Martin, Savan Kotecha, Adam Levine and Shellback, is one of the biggest selling singles of 2012! The smash hit keeps on moving sales and has spent over nine weeks at No. 1 on Billboard's Hot 100.
